metadata.description:
The prestigious *High School of Fashion and Design* attracts the best and
brightest*future fashion stars* in Los Angeles; to stand even a chance of
making it, you can't go it alone. Best friends *Claire, Ashley, Sue-Ni,
Ruby and Kaya* are there for each other and they're ready to take the
fashion world by storm. Whether it's fashion design, interiors, or new
technologies, these four have the unique skills and passion they'll need to
change the game . . .

*. . . and to save the world!*
metadata.name: Stardoll
